name: DUMBSTER DIVING
description:
Dive in trash and survive.

Dumbster Diving is a top down shmup were you cant shoot and must use your enemies bullets against them.

-3 worlds

-Final Boss

-Endless Mode

-10 unlockable items.

This is a small game, I made it for fun and it should last you for about an hour or so. Still, you can try and get the longest time in Endless Mode or unlock every item for added challenge !

NO CONTROLLER SUPPORT, ONLY MOUSE AND KEYBOARD ARE NEEDED.
